title: Sinopia Profile Schema
description: Profile, or array of Resource Templates with some top-level metadata.

Profile.title: Profile
Profile.description: Profile key always at top level of a Sinopia Profile.

adherence.title: Adherence
adherence.description: The standards or rules that this profile adheres to.

author.title: Author
author.description: Contact information associated with the profile.

description.title: Description
description.description: Textual description associated with the profile.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier associated with the profile. Eventually, a Profile URI.

remark.title: Remark
remark.description: Comment or guiding statement intended to be presented as supplementary information in user display.
example: Title information relating to a resource: work title, preferred title, instance title, transcribed title, translated title, variant form of title, etc.

schema.title: URL for Profile's JSON schema
schema.description: The profile adheres to the JSON schema at this URL

source.title: Source URI
source.description: URL or URI for the profile in the author's source repository or space.

title.title: Title
title.description: Textual title associated with the profile.
